# material

**Instance Property**

The physics body’s material properties, like friction.

## Declaration

```swift
var material: PhysicsMaterialResource
```

## Discussion

By default, the body’s material resource is set to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicsMaterialResource/default], which provides a modest amount of friction and restitution (bounciness).
title: material
